description:
Uzume Uno, a new card master, trains with her five dolls, girls that appear from cards, called Fantasista Dolls. Uzume starts to have trouble, and wants to return the cards to their previous owners.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sasara Sarasara: Kari ni mo My Master?
ささらさらさら 仮にもマイマスター?
